overview: Ad executives Randy Spears and Jonathon Morgan are brainstorming for slogans to move a new sports car while outside, in the Jacuzzi, their wives Nikki Dial and Tiffany Minx are storming each other. Seems their hubbies have been a little inattentive of late, and it's time for some much-needed lovin'. Later, the boys get a visit from Meekah and Christine Appleigh.
title: American Built
